title: Bret Baier On How FDR, Churchill, and Stalin Collaborated to Win World War II for the Allies
text:
Bret Baier, Chief Political Anchor for Fox News & Anchor of Special Report, spoke with Brian Kilmeade about his new book "Three Days at the Brink: FDR's Daring Gamble to Win World War II" which focuses on the Tehran Conference, where Franklin D. Roosevelt, Winston Churchill, and Joseph Stalin plotted World War II's endgame, including the D-Day invasion.

Plus, Bret spoke about the news of the day, including Hillary Clinton calling Tulsi Gabbard a Russian asset.
